solution_line_template: There are {forks} + {knives} + {spoons} + {teaspoons} = <<{forks}+{knives}+{spoons}+{teaspoons}={initial_total_cutlery}>>{initial_total_cutlery} pieces before adding more cutlery.

{added_per_type} of each {num_cutlery_types} types of cutlery are added, and therefore {added_per_type} x {num_cutlery_types} = <<{added_per_type}*{num_cutlery_types}={total_added_cutlery}>>{total_added_cutlery} pieces added.
In total there are {initial_total_cutlery} + {total_added_cutlery} = <<{initial_total_cutlery}+{total_added_cutlery}={final_total_cutlery}>>{final_total_cutlery} pieces of cutlery in the drawer
